briefTitle: Effect of Diet and Exercise in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Fit for the Fight: Effect of a Multidisciplinary Diet and Exercise Program on Body Weight, Quality of Life and Inflammation in Survivors of Triple-negative Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ER/PR/HER2neu negative breast cancer
* at least 3 months after end of treatment
* BMI at least 25

Exclusion Criteria:

* stage IV cancer
